description:
A woman escaping the clutches of the church for acquiring knowledge that is 
forbidden.

A boy looking for his half sister's parents ... and his own ...

An honorable soldier who has to betray everything he believes in for the honor
of his family and the justice of the church he serves ...

Welcome to the world of Final Fantasy Legacy, based on a multi-writer fanfic 
started by Brian Stricklin, where the fate of young people, Mystic Academy 
students, church servants, and soldiers, are intertwined with the mission of 
the unknown enemy acting in the shadows.

You play as Davin, a Mystic Academy student visiting his sister in his 
hometown of Tienne when the unexpected happens and his destiny becomes 
intertwined with Marcine, an ex-priestess of the Church of Tienne now turn 
fugitive for breaking a taboo.

This game only features the first chapter of the fanfic.

Completion time should be about 15 to 30 minutes.

Enjoy!
